snippet.title: Solar Sands | By: Vinyl Dial & V//Tomo | Introducing Local Multiplayer
snippet.description:
Local Multiplayer is making its way to Fret Smasher very soon with support up to 4 players in co-op and competitive play! Play with friends in Classic Mode to achieve a high-score as a group or go head to head in competitive modes such as Classic Face-off.

Follow us on Twitter and join our Discord for more information and to stay up to date.

--
Listen to more from Vinyl Dial: https://vinyl-dial.com/
Listen to more from V//Гомо: https://vtomo.bandcamp.com/
Follow Vinyl Dial on Twitter: https://twitter.com/VinylDial
Follow V//Гомо on Twitter: https://twitter.com/veetomo
--

Fret Smasher On Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1420420?snr=5000_5100___primarylinks

Visit Our Website: https://lavoiestudios.ca/games/fret-smasher/

Join our Discord - https://discordapp.com/invite/F8vZW85

Follow our Twitter - https://twitter.com/FretSmasher

--

Developed and Published by: Lavoie Studios
